    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86119</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bungee jumping</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Federelementspringen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Saut à l'élastique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Saltar do tirante com mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Salto dell'ammortizzatore ausiliario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλμα Bungee</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El saltar del amortiguador auxiliar</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a bungee jumper and the forces acting on it, including the force of gravity and force in the rubber.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bungee jumping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elastic potential energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rubber</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen 
Federelementüberbrücker und die Kräfte, die auf ihr, 
einschließlich die Kraft von Schwerkraft und Kraft im Gummi 
fungieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un cavalier de 
saut à l'élastique et les forces agissant là-dessus, y compris la force de la
pesanteur et la force dans le caoutchouc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma ligação em ponte do
tirante com mola e as forças que agem nela, including a força da 
gravidade e a força na borracha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un ponticello 
dell'ammortizzatore ausiliario e le forze che si comportano su esso, 
compreso la forza di gravità e la forza nella gomma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν άλτη bungee και 
τις δυνάμεις ενεργώντας σε το, συμπεριλαμβανομένης της δύναμης της
βαρύτητας και της δύναμης στο λάστιχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un puente del 
amortiguador auxiliar y las fuerzas que actúan en ella, incluyendo la
fuerza de la gravedad y la fuerza en el caucho.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Federelementspringen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elastische mögliche Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
